description:
Incentives for Protocol Usage April to December, 2024

## Discussion

Close the Bolts program and distribute ODG incentives using Merkl.xyz

See forum discussion https://commonwealth.im/open-dollar-governance/discussion/25865-second-attempt-closing-the-bolts-program-and-distribution-of-rewards

## Budget

Total budget: 35,000 ODG (5% of the community budget) + Merkl.xyz fee 175 ODG

## Distribution: 

142 users divided into 4 tiers. Users with less than 10,000 Bolts were not included. Thes parameters were chosen to engage more active users and encourage them to continue community participation and contribution.

1. Top 14 addresses - 1000  
2. Next 22 - 477.2727  
3. Next 35 - 200  
4. Last 71 - 49.2957 

Bolts earned list: [Github](https://github.com/open-dollar/od-bot/blob/dev/queries/export_2024-12-01.csv)

Airdrop list: [Github](https://github.com/open-dollar/od-bot/blob/dev/scripts/merkl-airdrop-dec-2024.json), [IPFS](https://angle-blog.infura-ipfs.io/ipfs/QmUXfvXfbtRev7m7wPyjFMLsjwuhEzgnyj3FS7arqKiDo3)

## Contract Interaction

1. Approve tokens to Merkl contract
2. Agree to the Merkl ToC here https://app.merkl.xyz/merklTerms.pdf
3. Create the campaign using the IPFS Airdrop file above
